document_api_meta.title: Seller Search Affiliate Open Collaboration Product
document_api_meta.env_desc:
This API is used to search the information of products with open collaboration by category, commission rate, and keywords. It will return all products on the TikTok Shop Affiliate Product Marketplace that are in an open collaboration.
Sellers can only search for open collaboration within the regions they are registered to sell in.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: sort_order
request_query_param.desc:
The sort order for the sort_field parameter. Default: ASC
Possible values:
- ASC: Ascending order
- DESC: Descending order

request_query_param.name: sort_field
request_query_param.desc:
The returned results will be sorted by the specified field. See the description of the field values in the request body for more information about each field.
Default: commission_rate
Possible values:
- commission_rate
- product_sales_price
- commission
- units_sold

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the next_page_token from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc: The number of results to be returned per page. Valid range: [1-20].

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: title_keywords
request_body_param.desc: A list of product keywords. Product titles, or names, are loosely matched. Keywords in the list form a query and the resulting set of matching product names is based on the conjunctive operator `AND` between each keyword. For example, the keyword list `["Men", "Fashion"]` creates a query `"Men" AND "Fashion"` and the resulting set of matching product names contains the loosely matched conjuction of "Men" and "Fashion" such as "Male Fashionable". Maximum length of the list is 20 keywords. Maximum keyword string length is 255 characters.

request_body_param.name: sales_price_range
request_body_param.desc: Restricts the products in the search results to those with prices greater than or equal to the expressed minimum price and less than the expressed maximum price

request_body_param.name: ^amount_ge
request_body_param.desc: The product price must be greater than this value in order to be included in the search results. The value must be greater than `0`.

request_body_param.name: ^amount_lt
request_body_param.desc: The product price must be greater than this value in order to be included in the search results. The value must be greater than `0`. No upper bound is set if this property is not included.

request_body_param.name: category
request_body_param.desc: Restricts the products in the search results to those that are associated with the expressed product category.

request_body_param.name: ^id
request_body_param.desc: The category identifier. Note that only first-level categories are supported.

request_body_param.name: commission_rate_range
request_body_param.desc: Restricts products in the search results to those with a commision rate greater than the expressed minimum commission rate and less than the expressed maximum commission rate.

request_body_param.name: ^rate_ge
request_body_param.desc: The commission rate must be greater than this value in order to be included in the search results. The commission rate is expressed in hundredths of a percent. For example, `3587` is a commission rate of `35.87%`. This value must a minimum of `1000`.

request_body_param.name: ^rate_lt
request_body_param.desc: The commission rate must be less than this value in order to be included in the search results. The commission rate is expressed in hundredths of a percent. For example, `3587` is a commission rate of `35.87%`. This value must a minimum of `1000`.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^products
response_param.desc: The list of products meeting the search criteria expressed in the request body.

response_param.name: ^^shop
response_param.desc: Metadata and data associated with the TikTok Shop that sells the product.

response_param.name: ^^^name
response_param.desc: The name of the TikTok shop.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The product identifier.

response_param.name: ^^has_inventory
response_param.desc: Set to `true` if there are more than zero units of the product in inventory. Set to `false` if there are zero units in inventory.

response_param.name: ^^units_sold
response_param.desc: The total number of units sold of this product.

response_param.name: ^^title
response_param.desc: The product name.

response_param.name: ^^sale_region
response_param.desc: The region where the product is offered for sale.

response_param.name: ^^main_image_url
response_param.desc: The product image URL.

response_param.name: ^^detail_link
response_param.desc: The URL for the product's detail page.

response_param.name: ^^original_price
response_param.desc: The original price of the product.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The lowest original price of all SKUs of the product.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The highest original price of all SKUs of the product.

response_param.name: ^^category_chains
response_param.desc: A list of categories associated with the product.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The category identifier.

response_param.name: ^^^local_name
response_param.desc: The name of the product in the category.

response_param.name: ^^^is_leaf
response_param.desc: Set to `true` if this category is a leaf node. Set to `false` if not.

response_param.name: ^^^parent_id
response_param.desc: The category identifier of the parent category for the category.

response_param.name: ^^commission
response_param.desc: Metadata and data associated with the commission rates for the product.

response_param.name: ^^^rate
response_param.desc: The commission rate in hundredths of a percent. For example, `3587` is a commission rate of `35.87%`. This value must a minimum of `1000`.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The commission amount.

response_param.name: ^^sales_price
response_param.desc: Metadata and data associated with the price at which this product was sold for at this commission rate.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The lowest promotion price of all SKUs of this product.

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The highest promotion price of all SKUs of this product.

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: Total count of products meeting the search criteria expressed in the request body.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.AffiliateSellerV202405API.AffiliateSeller202405OpenCollaborationsProductsSearchPost(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.SortOrder("DESC")
    request = request.SortField("commission_rate")
    request = request.PageToken("b2Zmc2V0PTAK")
    request = request.PageSize(20)
    request = request.ShopCipher("GCP_XF90igAAAABh00qsWgtvOiGFNqyubMt3")
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBody := affiliateSeller_v202405.NewAffiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBody()
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodyTitleKeywordsList := []string{"Men","Fashion"," Sports Short"}
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBody.SetTitleKeywords(affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodyTitleKeywordsList)
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodySalesPriceRange := affiliateSeller_v202405.NewAffiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodySalesPriceRange()
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodySalesPriceRange.SetAmountGe("12.44")
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodySalesPriceRange.SetAmountLt("100")
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBody.SetSalesPriceRange(*affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodySalesPriceRange)
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodyCategory := affiliateSeller_v202405.NewAffiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodyCategory()
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodyCategory.SetId("3412342")
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBody.SetCategory(*affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodyCategory)
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodyCommissionRateRange := affiliateSeller_v202405.NewAffiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodyCommissionRateRange()
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodyCommissionRateRange.SetRateGe(100)
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodyCommissionRateRange.SetRateLt(8000)
    affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBody.SetCommissionRateRange(*affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBodyCommissionRateRange)
    request = request.AffiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBody(*affiliateSeller202405SellerSearchAffiliateOpenCollaborationProductRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

sample_code.label: Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access a Seller's overall TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including but not limited to collaboration details (e.g., activity, applications, descriptions, and performance), creator participation/engagement results, affiliate links, affiliate orders, and sample rules.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including but not limited to collaboration activity and performance, creator participation/engagement results, affiliate links, and affiliate orders.
